itemLabel: Derry Irvine, Baron Irvine of Lairg

wikipedia_page.main: Alexander Andrew Mackay Irvine, Baron Irvine of Lairg  (born 23 June 1940), known as Derry Irvine, is a Scottish lawyer, judge, and political figure who served as Lord Chancellor under his former pupil barrister, Tony Blair.

response: *  1940   – Derry Irvine, Baron Irvine of Lairg, Scottish lawyer, judge, and politician, Lord High Chancellor of Great Britain
